mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Fremont, John C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excellency Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 20 1862. By Telegraph from Franklin 20 1862. Upon fuller examination I ask you to Suspend the appointment of Capt Gibson as Lieut Col the Good of the Regiment may require another selection from among its officers JC Fremont Maj Genl Comdg 29Gs126pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fremont, John C.
Franklin, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
